nodes.text: The Mumbri Storve was a seedy cantina located on a planet near Tangrene.

During the Thrawn campaign, Rogue Squadron pilots Wedge Antilles, Wes Janson and Derek Klivian spent several hours there in an attempt to drop a hint that the New Republic would be attacking Tangrene for the crystal gravfield trap located there. The trio was rescued from an Imperial spy who had noticed their presence in the Mumbri Storve thanks to the help of Aves and two other members of Talon Karrde's organization.
